game.description: Save the kingdom from the tyranny of an evil king.
game.objective: Overthrow the evil king and restore peace in the kingdom.
game.reward: Sword of Valour and 5000 gold coins

tasks.description: Find the map of the secret tunnel leading to the king's castle.
tasks.location: Old haunted tree in the forbidden forest.

tasks.description: Get the invisibility cloak from the Goblin King.
tasks.objective: Trade the Golden Apple for the invisibility cloak with the Goblin King.

tasks.description: Infiltrate the castle using the invisibility cloak and map.
tasks.objective: Get to the king's chambers unnoticed and confront him.

game.title: Quest to Save the Kingdom
